title: HealthBench: Evaluating Large Language Models Towards Improved Human Health
details: RK Arora, J Wei, RS Hicks, P Bowman… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: We present HealthBench, an open-source benchmark measuring the performance and safety of large language models in healthcare. HealthBench consists of 5,000 multi-turn conversations between a model and an individual user or healthcare …

title: Highly Undersampled MRI Reconstruction via a Single Posterior Sampling of Diffusion Models
details: J Liu, Q Lin, Z Xiong, S Shan, C Liu, M Li, F Liu… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Incoherent k-space under-sampling and deep learning-based reconstruction methods have shown great success in accelerating MRI. However, the performance of most previous methods will degrade dramatically under high acceleration factors …
